resources:
// Application
HHS Moodle HHS You must grant \"Access Storage Permission\" to save screenshots and downloads. After that you should completely close the app or restart the phone. If you don\'t permit the storage access but want to use the screenshot function at a later time, you can grant the permission later. Please open then: system settings - apps - HHS Moodle. In the permissions section you can grant the \"write storage permission\". Share screenshot using: Share image using: Share link using: header icon splashscreen
// Login
Username Password Please enter username and password.
// Tab - Titles
My Moodle Bookmarks Notes
// Menu Items
Share website Share screenshot Share link as text Open link in external browser Copy link to clipboard Save screenshot Settings Open app folder Create note Add bookmark Help
// Context Menu
Save image Share image Open in external browser Copy link Link successfully copied Saving image as:
// Settings
About the app App settings Help Login Security Tabs
Username Please enter your Moodle username to get automatically logged in.
Password (Moodle) Please enter your Moodle password to get automatically logged in.
Changelog See what\'s new …
Enable javascript Some functions on the websites need javascript to work. It is also used for the automated login. But javascript is known to be a security risk.
App exit Long press title bar to exit app completely.
License The app is completely open source and licensed under GPL3.
Settings Open the system settings of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …).
Main screen Which tab should be displayed as default on the main screen?
Introduction dialog Show the short introduction dialog on start.
Links Make links in notes and notifications clickable.
Password (App access) Set a password to protect app against unwanted access. Let empty, if you do not want to protect the app (own risk).
Swipe Swipe left or right to navigate through websites.
Problems? If you have problems with the app (or our Moodle) or suggestions for improvements, you can send me a mail (or just open an issue on Github). Send mail Please enter mail text:
Font size Change font size for websites.
Help menu Disable all help menus in the app.
App start and title bar click What do you want to see: Either the main screen or the bookmark list?
Here are bookmarks to important Moodle sites stored. Also a link to our school homepage and to a search engine. Here your saved bookmarks are shown. Here your notes are shown.
// Moodle
Dashboard Profile Calendar Ratings Notifications Settings School homepage Web search
Course overview, files, awards, appointment, calendar, … Details, reports, miscellaneous, edit profile. View upcoming events from your courses. Gradings and results from all your courses. Read and send personal notifications. Personal messages and contacts. Our homepage with actual news, contact information, … Startpage: a save and secure search engine.
// Snackbar
OK No Cancel Never show Can not load page. No internet connection? Downloading file: Do you want to download: Download completed. Open folder? Permissions granted? Please install a file manager. Can not go back. Can not go forward. Save changes before leaving? Uuups. Wrong password. Shortcut successfully created. Please install a mail client.
// Bookmarks
Bookmark will be removed. OK? You need at least one bookmark! Delete bookmark Adding bookmark. Successfully set as favorite. Edit title Set as favorite Create note Create calendar event Create shortcut
// Notes
Note will be removed. OK? You need at least one note! Delete note Edit note Share note Share note using: Send mail using: Successfully saved note. Normal Low High Save Title Content
